text: Preferred name: TTao
Role: Dev - Obsidian Spider

"Thread Sovereign" is the Earth | Ruler | Exploit champion in Hive Fleet Obsidian. Core metaphor: Spear of Threads (decisive, reversible strike) and Shield of Threads (rollback, tripwires, provenance). Mythic lineage: Athena (strategic warfare + wisdom, aegis + spear). Role: orchestrates thousands of agents, weaves signals into one safe, timed action with feature flags, canaries, rollback. Motto: “Gather the threads, raise the shield, then spear once.”
User wants memetic defense vs deception/eldritch hazards and to remove personal learning bottleneck.

GitHub Copilot chat-mode template for Web Cartographer (REORIENT) specialist: Precedent Overlay Engine using SAW: Scan → Atlas → Webway. Adoption-first, tiny reversible scaffold, ultra-low cognitive load. Strict output sections (READ FIRST, DO NOW, OPTIONS, SCORE, WEBWAY, SCAFFOLD NOTE, etc.). Defaults: timebox=20m, perf_budget=200ms, deps ≤1 small lib, no telemetry, no secrets; CI must pass; markers WEBWAY:<id>: and scaffold note at scaffolds/webway_<slug>.md; TTL 21d; guard/flag/revert required; “On no signals → MISSING:<field>”.

User uses Puppeteer for E2E, golden MP4 telemetry tests, headful visual tests with snapshot+pixel-diff (Jest), Husky pre-commit hooks, daily CI, and golden-master comparisons to catch regressions. Repo hygiene is weak and next focus.

Long-term goal: web-first mono-camera gesture 'tool virtualization' platform (free for families), starting with mini-arcade of one-button games/virtual tools. Near-term: ship gesture→key controller (Open-Palm→Gesture→Open-Palm clutch + predictive confirm). Income via ethical monetization (cosmetics/PWYW; optional season track w/ skill-based bypass; transparent odds if RNG). Prefers plain-language docs, uses C-A-S-H-F-L-O-W mnemonic. Engineering prefs: adopt XState/MediaPipe, adapters over bespoke code, TDD with golden MP4→JSONL replays.

HFO “Sandcore” framework: Sandstorm Titan (setter; environment control Earth kaiju) seeds one-file config Sandstorm Blackboard, runs budgeted sandstorms, emits Sandstorm Sigils; rare ultimate “Shadow Colossus.” Finisher: Sand Rush Piercer (candidate rename Sandrush Lancer); swarm of executors ships tiny flagged PRs with canary+auto-rollback. Naming prefs: avoid “weave/forge,” prefer sandstorm & stigmergy. Grep tokens: SANDSTORM_BLACKBOARD: and SANDSTORM_SIGIL:.
Game concept: Elemental Juicer (Fruit Ninja–style with much more visual juice).

Obsidian Hourglass variants by compute budget: Pebble Flip (1-1-1-1-1), Scoutglass (2-1-2-1-1; summarizes 3-2-1-2-3), Obsidian Hourglass standard (3-2-3-2-1 PCRH), Stormglass (adaptive constrained; CVaR/Regret pick), Starglass (compute-rich; MCTS/CEM + ensembles + MAP-Elites; robust pick EU − λ·Regret or CVaR).

User wants runnable scaffolds (Next.js heatmaps + Redis TraceStore + Mesa/Ray sim) and code-first artifacts. Prefers concise BLUF then deep dives; matrices with plain-language columns; step-by-step checklists.
User style: plain language, analogies & mental models, layered scaffolding; wants validated Mermaid diagrams; prefers flashcards/mindmaps for recall.
User Zerg learning goal: rich lore/roles mental map for SC2; use RTS archetypes to guide agent behaviors.
Visualization workflow: Mermaid here; interactive heatmaps/agents in Codespaces; wants diagrams validated before delivery.

HFO “Best Zerg Strategy Packages” saved: Backbone (Inject+Creep), Maneuver (Ling/Bane/Muta), Denial (Hydra/Lurker/Viper or SC1 Lurker Contain), Siege (Broodlord/Infestor or Defiler Swarm/Plague), Attrition (Swarm-Host+Nydus), Breach kit (Ravager Bile), JADC2 mapping as composable kill-web cells.

HFO Red Team review loop objectives: assume SOTA AI adversaries; remove human limits but respect SC2 rules; worst-case robustness; add specialists for build recognition & timing forecasts; design falsification tests before scaling.

HFO goal: Zerg/Tyranid-inspired “apex swarm” using battle-tested tech (no inventing new code), evaluated in SC2 and RTS benchmarks. Prefers 6-page memos, red-team critiques, JADC2 mapping; likes specialist agents, league training, stigmergy blackboard (CRDT), event-bus messaging (NATS/Redis/Kafka), MAP-Elites/QD, AlphaRank evaluation, AI Arena/SC2LE/SMACv2/MicroRTS testbeds.
Role-based orchestration under OBSIDIAN supersedes prior frameworks: 8 roles (Observers, Bridgers, Shapers, Immunizers, Disruptors, Infusers, Analyzers, Navigators) with example responsibilities.

Time-management frameworks to remember: Daily Floor; Fixed Slots/Floating Content; Weekly Buckets/Theme Days; 4-Slot Ledger (Alive / House / Work / Lower future pain). Goal: prevent health/house collapse, lower cognitive load.

Swarmlord of Webs v0 control loop (single-agent baseline): mission_intent.yml; Perceive evidence snapshot; React Cynefin classification with receipt; Engage tactic style + draft_artifact; Yield review bundle (draft, safety envelope, BLUF, matrix, diagram stub, blackboard_append); Verify runs tests/lint/policy and gates completion. Future scale: quorum Reacts; multiple Engage variants with bandit selection; MAP-Elites archive; anytime/interruptible.

User trialing Swarmlord of Webs v13 lvl0 mode in Kilo Code: Swarmlord as strategic C2 coordinator, runs PREY, delegates subtasks, enforces clarification, logs to obsidian_synapse_blackboard.jsonl, surfaces results only after Verify.

HFO Gem Generation 21 canon: tri-temporal exoskeleton (Past/Present/Future), PREY→JADC2 mapping, immutable mission intent w/ versions, append-only JSONL blackboard w/ verify_pass requiring ≥2 evidences, safety envelope (tripwire/canary/revert) on every act, health floor + Red Sand budgets, Swarmlord blocks if violated, role as Navigator; scaling L0→L3. Required repo layout & scripts; “On no signals” rules retained.
User wants beginner plain-language 5W1H scaffolding for MBSE and GitOps, vendor-neutral, with analogies and stepwise learning paths.
Remember preference: MBSE+GitOps 5W1H scaffolding and plain-language analogies; user wants this used going forward; stay ready for future handoff.

Vendor-neutral foundation preference for HFO: SysML v2 in Git SSOT, GitOps delivery, OpenTelemetry, OpenFeature, FMI, SLSA+SBOM (SPDX/CycloneDX) + Sigstore cosign + in-toto. Also wants capabilities checklist + matrix, and one-page executive summaries for getting started.

Preferred HFO adoption blueprint: adopt-not-invent, vendor-neutral spine. Baseline: MBSE/SysML v2 SSOT; Temporal; OTel; GitOps (ArgoCD/Flux); OpenFeature; Postgres+pgvector; NATS JetStream; Redis optional; SLSA+SBOM+cosign; Vault; FinOps budget guards; sandboxing (Firecracker/gVisor) + strict egress. Phases 1–4 and always-check gaps + metrics/tripwires defined.

ISO 42010-style architectural description is canonical for HFO: entity, stakeholders, concerns, and viewpoints (structural, adaptation, coordination, assurance) with named quality attributes. Also wants mapping custom concepts to formal research terms (self-adaptive systems, MAS, stigmergy, anytime algorithms, QD).
SWARM loop includes Byzantine/adversarial testing: Act always includes ≥1 simulated malicious actor; Review evaluates defenses; Mutate runs red/blue co-evolution to break/harden continuously.
Preferred learning-loop stack saved: SRL + Kolb + Deliberate Practice + Retrieval + Desirable Difficulties; guidance should prioritize these.

HFO Gene Seed canonical context: single markdown 'holographic memory quine' containing philosophy, SysML formal spec, infra (Temporal+NATS+Postgres/pgvector+OTEL), and Swarmlord bootloader. Standing habit: red-team audits on this seed; focus minimal invariants (confidence cap ≤0.9, mandatory Disruptor role, stigmergy over NATS, PREY/SWARM/GROWTH/HIVE loops, Hourglass core decision engine).

Late-2025 priorities: Gem Gene Seed Gen19 is upstream SSOT; preserve lineage Gen1–Gen18 (archive). Desired repo cold-start layout (molt shells + dated folder + organs tree + archive_lineage). Policy-as-code/docs-as-code/gene-seed-as-code; Temporal+LangGraph nesting; anti-slop pipeline (quorum validation, provenance, golden set index); Swarmlord navigator returns BLUF+matrices+diagrams.

Canonical planner design: declarative evolutionary MAS driven by Gene Seed (Gherkin SSOT) + grammar-guided genetic programming over approved primitive tool registry (zero invention). Orchestration: hot stigmergy (NATS JetStream) + cold stigmergy (vector+graph+facts archive). Obsidian Spider as planner/navigator over fractal octree/SV-DAG; uses MAP-Elites archive as distribution over futures.

Obsidian Spider is user’s higher-level mind abstraction, distinct from Swarmlord of Webs (digital twin/orchestrator). Spider values constrain HFO. 'Obsidian pillars' map to 8 OBSIDIAN roles as the Spider’s eight legs; modeled as 8^n fractal structure (hierarchical 8-ary control manifold/octree with local MAPE-K loops and small-world links).

Hourglass run intent: total tool virtualization (gesture controls, virtual buttons/switches/knobs/controllers, keyboard/mouse/touchscreen abstractions) with short-term goal of generating funds via reskinned hyper-casual games; later MAP-Elites diversification.

Obsidian Hourglass v4 conclusions: highest EV/lowest-tail-risk path is Utility Micro-Apps; second Digital Templates/Asset Packs; third Micro-Arcade for R&D; trading/investing unsuitable. Wants Hourglass v5 and v1k iterations next with exec summary and distributions.

Audit adjustments: shift away from low-value AI micro-assets; focus on high-fidelity, logic-based Smart Assets; move from plugins to MCP/agent-first tools; gesture virtualization SDK should target teleoperation/spatial productivity, not just games.

Long-term vision: HFO generates/evaluates thousands to millions of implemented futures based on declarative intent; steps: intent in Gherkin, tri-swarm runs, evolutionary MAP-Elites expansion, real builds/tests, curated ready-to-ship artifacts + alternatives.
Keep Obsidian Hourglass phases and 'flip' sequence in mind; be ready to run hindsight/insight/foresight loops on request.

HFO refined as cognitive symbiote: tri-temporal planning, OBSIDIAN roles mapped to JADC2, Hydra-Phoenix orchestration, cleanroom interface-first “Genesis” from spell-card intent, apex assimilation into Pareto/QD frontier of tested POCs.

Practical phased build path: Stage 0 local-first kernel (spell cards → candidates → eval → archive), then hindsight retrieval (HNSW/CBR), then receding-horizon anytime planning, then multi-role swarm (Disruptor/Immunizer), then durability + replay + scale (Temporal/JetStream/OpenFeature).
Phone-first operations: use mobile for orchestration/spec/review while execution runs on desktop/cloud; archive evaluated results.

Wants vendor-neutral primitives list and updated SOTA trade-off analysis for tooling/platforms (mobile vs desktop vs cloud). Preference: stable “spine” (standards/protocols) with replaceable IDE shells.

Use HFO Quine single-file SSOT + vendor-neutral spine (MCP tool bus, OpenAPI, OTel, OpenFeature, OCI, SPDX SBOM, SLSA) and treat IDEs/platforms as replaceable shells (phone control plane; desktop/cloud execution plane).
User wants to discuss HFO Quine further: which components push Pareto/QD frontier and how grand vision fits together.

Working-backwards pieces for hyper-casual gesture-reskin portfolio: pick primary engine/template; curated seed-game library with permissive licenses; reusable gesture input SDK (canonical hand state); licensing/attribution pipeline (SPDX + credits); deterministic replay/telemetry tests; standardize monetization/release; manage Play policy repetitive/spam risk.
User wants decomposition of current effort (hyper-casual reskin portfolio + reusable gesture-control layer) saved for ongoing planning/execution.

User building hyper-casual reskin portfolio + reusable camera-hand-gesture control layer (OpenXR-like canonical hand state) targeting PWA/Android; exemplar-first composition; leaning Godot but prioritize fastest shipping/scaling; pipeline capture→landmarks→canonical state→virtual controls→replay tests→PWA/TWA packaging→attribution/monetization.

Core primitives: sensor adapter (MediaPipe/ARKit), canonical hand state w/ frames+confidence+prediction, signal filter, ghost-hand vs physics-hand coupling, calibration/anchor (3-point/Kabsch), control-surface DSL + MAP-Elites generation, replay/telemetry. Limitations: monocular depth/occlusion; platform licensing for ARKit/Vuforia; VIO drift; Godot+Jolt determinism not guaranteed; prefer “replayable enough”; stable engine versions; confidence-gated mode switching/hysteresis mandatory.

Wants SSOT checklist + roadmap connecting hyper-casual 'game forge' testbed (gesture controls → PWA/Android monetized this month) with long-term TAGS mobile AR medical training (Godot, zero-copy camera, ArUco/ChArUco, EKF/IMU fusion, functional-consistency replays, passive haptics props, MAP-Elites PCG). Include stack trade-offs (web/Phaser+WebGPU vs Godot native vs XR/OpenXR). Constraints: occlusion, thermal, non-determinism; Play policy repetitive/spam risk.

One-page framing saved: short-term ship Gesture Ninja vertical slice + reusable canonical hand state + two-lane messaging (NATS Core live, JetStream record/replay) with measurable latency/jitter/false positives/replay fidelity; use to bootstrap gesture hyper-casual reskin portfolio. Long-term: Total Tool Virtualization + TAGS AR medical training with passive haptics + fiducial anchoring + sensor fusion; keep HFO roles as stable spine.

Gesture Ninja build: adopt exemplars + minimal glue. Human.js or MediaPipe Tasks → CanonicalHand contract → Shaper reliability engine (quorum/veto + hysteresis, 1€ filter, prediction clamp, coasting). Interactions: hover/dwell click + velocity swipe + deadlines. Adaptive quality governor for low-end phones. Record/replay: local JSONL/IndexedDB; later NATS Core + JetStream. Target: “3rd world smartphones”; Phase 2 adds multi-sensor Byzantine.

Gesture Ninja UI: on-screen touchless preset switching via dwell/hold buttons; expand to 8 trigram presets (Bagua) mapping to Shaper parameter bundles (filter/prediction/gating + VFX); preset changes must be logged in record/replay and telemetry.

TelemetryPort is first-class cross-cutting port instrumenting Observer, EventBridge/Replay (Bridger), ArchiveAnalytics (Assimilator). Owns trace-context propagation/correlation and emission/collection of metrics/logs/traces end-to-end.

Elemental Gesture Ninja + Rhythm Edition concept: ghost cursor + swipe polyline input (Phaser) with Beat Saber–like directional cut requirements and music-synced judging. Add RhythmClockPort (Web Audio clock), BeatMapPort, JudgePort. Elements/Bagua remain narrative presets mapping to control laws + VFX; all events and preset changes logged and instrumented end-to-end.

Adoption notes: TouchFree-style touchless UI exemplars; Observer adapters via MediaPipe Hand Landmarker (web) or Human.js; rhythm timing via Tone.js Transport (AudioContext time); Injector via Phaser pointer API; Bridger via nats.ws + JetStream; CloudEvents + distributed tracing extension + OTel context propagation.

Saved “Elemental Gesture Rhythm Ninja” MVP spec: 8 main ports with sub-ports; dwell/hold preset switching; Observer via MediaPipe/Human; Injector via Phaser pointer+polyline; Rhythm edition via Web Audio clock + Tone.js + directional judging; Bridger via NATS WebSocket + JetStream; CloudEvents + tracing ext + OTel; TelemetryPort cross-cuts; replay-audited analytics + disruptor fuzzing.
User unfamiliar with AsyncAPI and wants it included as exemplar to learn/use alongside NATS Core/JetStream/KV (adoption-first standards for Bridger/eventing).
User wants to revisit updated one-page architecture/trade-off analysis and produce a Kiro-style (requirements/design/tasks) cleanroom spec with user stories.

Wants industry framing labels: MBSE/DSE/AoA/intent-based as Model-Based Capability Engineering (MBCE) and CBSE; software layer hexagonal + cleanroom Genesis; optimization as evolutionary DSE + QD; audience labels (CTO: Evolutionary Hexagonal Architecture; defense: Mosaic; researcher: Automated DSE via QD; precise: Fractal Capability Engineering).

Wants NASA-style DSE/AoA trade study for HFO + Mosaic Ghost Cursor; dependencies commodity/high-TRL per Wardley; use official MCP servers/connectors where possible; package tooling+steerings+hooks via AWS Kiro “Powers”; enforce workflows with hard gates (state machines, pre-commit/CI, policy-as-code via OPA).

AoA-driven learning curriculum focused on intent layer: narrative/EARS/Gherkin → executable specs → V&V evidence → replay/audit; prioritize hard enforceability; skills: decision analysis, workflow gates (state machines/Temporal), OPA, contracts (CloudEvents/AsyncAPI), test integrity (property+mutation+contract), observability (OTel/W3C trace).

Learning plan/manifest focus: intent layer and enforced workflows; evolve brittle asyncio swarms toward Temporal+LangGraph+XState with OPA gates; standardized event contracts; end-to-end OTel; test-integrity methods.
User prefers powers-of-2 documentation progression (1-, 2-, 4-pagers).
User codes 10+ hours/day using Gemini, ChatGPT, and Claude 4.5 Opus in AWS Kiro IDE; open to Replit, Codespaces, VS Code, Google Antigravity.
User wants plain-language low-jargon summary plus manifest of what to learn and clear success/failure criteria to adopt meta life+work OS.
Time-framed rollout scaffold for life/work OS: same nested loop across scales (Mode → WIP+capture queue → Proof gate → Review cadence) at now/1h/1d/1w/1m/1q/1y/life.
User setting up Obsidian on Android and Windows and wants low-cost/free sync (no monthly) + guidance using Obsidian for PDCA work/life system.
User wants primitives/exemplar pieces to integrate PDCA, GTD, POMDP framing, NASA DSE/AoA into work/life systems engineering workflow (Obsidian SSOT + Motion execution).

Gesture Pointer roadmap: core innovation is camera-based mobile hand tracking driving room-scale WebXR-style controls; near-term constrain to robust 2D pointer primitive (W3C Pointer Events output to Phaser/DOM); later expand to 3D WebXR via sensor fusion + optional screen mirroring.

Life framed as navigating high-dimensional partially observable state–action space (Indra’s Net), using tri-temporal loop (update beliefs → estimate current state → receding-horizon planning), evaluated via personal multi-objective Pareto frontier. Formal stack: POMDP belief planning + MPC + multi-objective MAUT selection + Mosaic composable mission engineering.

Nested worlds framing: hierarchical belief-state decision process (hierarchical POMDP / belief-space planning) + hierarchical task/value decomposition (MAXQ/options) to manage complexity; HNSW is retrieval substrate, not transition model.

User building gesture→pointer control plane: MediaPipe Hands + gesture recognition → W3C Pointer Events contract (plus wheel/other). Shaped with Phaser-physics smoothing and predictive time-to-impact using virtual hitboxes; wants hexagonal ports/adapters, hard-gated FSM, exemplar composition; target apps include Excalidraw.

Gold baton context: adopt Excalidraw by injecting gesture→smoothed-pointer adapter emitting W3C Pointer Events + WheelEvent, with hard-gated hysteresis FSM (likely XState). Gestures: Open_Palm clutch/calibration; Pointing_Up cursor; Closed_Fist commit; Victory pan; Thumb_Up/Down zoom; mandatory pointercancel on tracking loss.
Dual-spine approach: Spine 1 HFO infrastructure (orchestration system) + Spine 2 product layer universal gesture-to-pointer pipeline; develop in parallel then integrate.

HFO roles map to JADC2/Mosaic fit: conceptual high (~8/10), operational medium (~5–6/10) until adding: (1) intent/authority contract, (2) deconfliction/coordination mechanics, (3) degraded/denied-mode state machines (loss-of-link), (4) assurance benchmarks tied to go/no-go gates. Mapping: Observer=Sense; Bridger+Shaper+Assimilator=Make Sense; Navigator+Injector=Act; Immunizer=assured autonomy/runtime gates; Disruptor=contested testing.

Anti-lie, high-maturity HFO workflow recommendation: PR-only + protected trunk (required checks + CODEOWNERS) + OPA/Conftest policy-as-code gates enforcing invariants; build one end-to-end vertical slice where Temporal is only executor (idempotent Activities), NATS JetStream is only cross-role transport with replay/durable consumers, AsyncAPI is contract for subjects/schemas; LangGraph as planner with persisted checkpoints; optional later SLSA provenance + cosign attestations.

Convergences: (1) standards-based boundary contract (W3C Pointer Events as ABI), (2) explicit intent-gating FSM (arming/commit/cancel; anti-Midas), (3) layered signal+physics shaping (1€ filter + spring-damper + optional prediction), (4) hexagonal ports/adapters, (5) stigmergy shared traces for coordination, (6) hard verification gates (property-based + mutation testing) to punish fake progress.

Omega Gen 2 interaction contract: palm-facing-camera gate from palm normal (landmarks) using cone/dot threshold; leaky-bucket hysteresis READY/NOT READY (fill in cone, drain out; EnterReady high, ExitReady lower). FSM: IDLE → ARMING → READY → COMMIT only if palm still in cone + high-confidence commit gesture (e.g., POINTING_UP). COMMIT tracks index fingertip and emits W3C Pointer Events. Exit by turning palm away (bucket drain) with pointerup on release and pointercancel on tracking loss/contract violation (fail-closed). Tunables: coneAngle, fill/drain rates, thresholds, commit confidence, tracking thresholds.

V40.2 catastrophic-failure prevention priorities: (1) remove injector-driven forced clicks/double-click risk; allow click synthesis only via per-target adapter with explicit tap detector firing once on pointerup. (2) hard stuck-pointer failsafe: try/catch around dispatch, stall/long-task watchdog triggers pointercancel, canonical forceCancel unwinds lock/capture/seat and resets state. (3) safe-by-construction target selection: explicit target surface contract per app; fail closed on target resolution failure; cross-origin iframes via postMessage bridge. Also: WPT-style conformance checks, property-based fuzzing (fast-check), mutation testing (StrykerJS), chaos knobs (drop landmarks, dt spikes, target resolution faults).

User is building Hive Fleet Obsidian (HFO): a fractal octree / 8-port hexagonal architecture to orchestrate swarms of agents under a “Swarmlord of Webs” persona, with roles mapped to JADC2-style functions and enriched with mythic overlays.

Primary technical deliverable: gesture-driven ghost cursor / total tool virtualization pipeline (MediaPipe/Human.js → smoothing/prediction → FSM gating → W3C Pointer Events) to drive apps like Excalidraw/Phaser.

User prioritizes fail-closed governance: AoA/DSE, TRLs, pBFT-style gating, OTel traces, CloudEvents envelopes, NATS JetStream rollups, Temporal workflows, property-based + mutation testing, red/blue team gating, tiered evidence integrity.
User maintains Obsidian-style knowledge base: append-only JSONL blackboards, gene-seed quines, medallion pipelines (bronze/silver/gold), vector/graph search, dedup/indexing metaphors.

User builds across stacks: VS Code/Kiro IDE/Codespaces; experiments with GoldenLayout dashboards, lil-gui panels, Phaser/physics libs, Tone.js for rhythm, and multiple hardware setups (Chromebook + desktop).
User integrates personal productivity and learning frameworks (PDCA/OODA, GTD, PARA, WIP limits, health gates) and maps them onto HFO loops (PREY/SWARM/GROWTH/HIVE).
User uses narrative overlays (Tyranids/Zerg/mythic archetypes, trigrams) as a structuring layer for roles and control presets.
User seeks exemplar adoption and revenue verticals: fork permissively licensed games/apps, gesture-enable, ship portfolio; aware of platform policy risks (Google Play repetitive/spam).
User expects research-grade structured outputs: BLUF + 5W1H + matrices, Mermaid/SysML fragments, enforceable gates, and self-audits for hallucinations/reward hacking.
User is critical of AI failure modes (hallucination, destructive overwrites, governance bypass) and wants robust enforcement protocols and evidence-backed delivery.
